example.content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <row> <id>c026b619-8fa5-48a7-a724-228892cad44e</id> <additionalArtifacts/> <onboardingState>ONBOARDED</onboardingState> <operationalState>ENABLED</operationalState> <usageState>NOT_IN_USE</usageState> <userDefinedData> <customerId>TMAA6</customerId> <vimId>TMA125</vimId> <manufacturerId>18</manufacturerId> <modelId>16010203</modelId> <device_login>root</device_login> <device_password>ubisle38</device_password> <monitoring_profile_ref>VNF_MON_JUNIPER</monitoring_profile_ref> <heat> <heat_template_version>2015-04-30</heat_template_version> <description>HOT template (Heat Orchestration Template) for Juniper vSRX VNF. </description> <parameters> <key_name> <type>string</type> <description>Name of key-pair to be used for compute instance</description> <default/> </key_name> <flavor> <type>string</type> <description>Type of instance (flavor) to be used</description> <default>m1.medium</default> </flavor> <availability_zone> <type>string</type> <description>availability zone to be used</description> <default>standard</default> </availability_zone> <image_id> <type>string</type> <description>Image Name</description> <default>66c96610-f427-45fe-b7c9-e70d163f35e5</default> </image_id> <private_primary_network_id> <type>string</type> <description>Private primary network ID</description> <default>net3</default> </private_primary_network_id> <private_primary_subnetwork> <type>string</type> <description>Private primary sub-network name or ID</description> <default>net3_subnet</default> </private_primary_subnetwork> <private_secondary_network_id> <type>string</type> <description>Private secondary network ID</description> <default>net2</default> </private_secondary_network_id> <private_secondary_subnetwork> <type>string</type> <description>Private secondary sub-network name or ID</description> <default>net2_subnet</default> </private_secondary_subnetwork> <public_network> <type>string</type> <description>Network private IP's to attach instance to .</description> <default>Floating-Public</default> </public_network> </parameters> <resources> <Junipervsrx> <type>OS::Nova::Server</type> <properties> <name>Junipervsrx</name> <key_name> <get_param>key_name</get_param> </key_name> <image> <get_param>image_id</get_param> </image> <flavor> <get_param>flavor</get_param> </flavor> <availability_zone> <get_param>availability_zone</get_param> </availability_zone> <networks> <row> <port> <get_resource>server_primary_port</get_resource> </port> </row> <row> <port> <get_resource>server_secondary_port</get_resource> </port> </row> </networks> <config_drive>true</config_drive> <user_data_format>RAW</user_data_format> <user_data>#junos-config system { root-authentication { encrypted-password "$5$FgYBloiu$uWknvCn20tUyUsHP8Uf3JuoSngcMf4TMMjrkCiRmVF9"; } name-server { 8.8.4.4; } services { ssh { root-login allow; } web-management { http { interface fxp0.0; } https { system-generated-certificate; interface[fxp0.0 ge-0/0/0.0]; } } } syslog { user * { any emergency; } file messages { any any; authorization info; } file interactive-commands { interactive-commands any; } } license { autoupdate { url https://ae1.juniper.net/junos/key_retrieval; } } } services { application-identification; } security { application-firewall { traceoptions { file app; flag all; } rule-sets apptest { rule 1 { match { dynamic-application junos:UNKNOWN; } then { deny; } } default-rule { permit; } } } application-tracking { first-update; } screen { ids-option untrust-screen { icmp { ping-death; } ip { source-route-option; tear-drop; } tcp { syn-flood { alarm-threshold 1024; attack-threshold 200; source-threshold 1024; destination-threshold 2048; timeout 20; } land; } } } nat { source { rule-set nat { from zone trust; to zone untrust; rule 1 { match { source-address 0.0.0.0/0; destination-address 0.0.0.0/0; } then { source-nat { interface; } } } } } } policies { from-zone trust to-zone trust { policy default-permit { match { source-address any; destination-address any; application any; } then { permit; log { session-init; session-close; } } } } from-zone trust to-zone untrust { policy default-permit { match { source-address any; destination-address any; application any; } then { permit { application-services { application-firewall { rule-set apptest; } } } } } } from-zone untrust to-zone trust { policy default-deny { match { source-address any; destination-address any; application any; } then { deny; } } } global { policy log-deny { match { source-address any; destination-address any; application any; } then { reject; log { session-init; session-close; } } } } } zones { security-zone untrust { screen untrust-screen; interfaces { ge-0/0/0.0 { host-inbound-traffic { system-services { ping; ssh; https; } } } } } security-zone trust; } } interfaces { ge-0/0/0 { unit 0 { family inet { dhcp-client; } } } fxp0 { unit 0 { family inet { dhcp-client; } } } } snmp { community ubiqube { authorization read-only; } }</user_data> </properties> </Junipervsrx> <server_primary_port> <type>OS::Neutron::Port</type> <properties> <network_id> <get_param>private_primary_network_id</get_param> </network_id> </properties> </server_primary_port> <server_floating_ip> <type>OS::Neutron::FloatingIP</type> <properties> <floating_network> <get_param>public_network</get_param> </floating_network> </properties> </server_floating_ip> <server_floating_ip_association> <type>OS::Neutron::FloatingIPAssociation</type> <properties> <floatingip_id> <get_resource>server_floating_ip</get_resource> </floatingip_id> <port_id> <get_attr> <row>Junipervsrx</row> <row>addresses</row> <row> <get_param>private_primary_network_id</get_param> </row> <row>0</row> <row>port</row> </get_attr> </port_id> </properties> </server_floating_ip_association> <server_secondary_port> <type>OS::Neutron::Port</type> <properties> <network_id> <get_param>private_secondary_network_id</get_param> </network_id> </properties> </server_secondary_port> </resources> </heat> <manufacturer>JUNIPER</manufacturer> <model>junOS generic</model> </userDefinedData> <_links> <self> <href>http://127.0.0.1:8380/ubi-etsi-mano/c026b619-8fa5-48a7-a724-228892cad44e</href> </self> <vnfd> <href>http://127.0.0.1:8380/ubi-etsi-mano/c026b619-8fa5-48a7-a724-228892cad44e/vnfd</href> </vnfd> <packageContent> <href>http://127.0.0.1:8380/ubi-etsi-mano/c026b619-8fa5-48a7-a724-228892cad44e/package_content</href> </packageContent> </_links> </row>

command.name: IMPORT
